Gangon looked up and seen BrightBlade...he was lying there and had heard
her...he dragged her over to a nice hiding place behind a rock and a tree
and hoped they could rest here.........
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 02, 2000 11:33 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
> * BrightBlade snarled as the staff buried deeply into her chest, the force
> knocking her off of the boulder and head over heels onto the ground
behind.
> She moaned as she opened her optics a little and looked at the remainder
of
> the staff sticking out of her chest, it had sunk deeply but just short of
> her spark.
> That mutt knew how to throw!
> BrightBlade sat up slowly and looked over at Gangon, she smiled weakly at
> him but then pulled the staff from her chest with a yip of pain.
> She tried to stand but she couldn't, the mech-fluid gushing from her chest
> from the blast she took for Gangon and the staff combined was too much.
> It wasn't long until she was back on her back and looking up at the sky,
she
> was breathing hard and bleeding even worse.
> Was this the end of her? That question raced through her mind as she laied
> on her back, but she knew that if Gangon fought now it would be the end of
> her days as well.
> BrightBlade slowly reached up and pulled the staff from her chest as she
> activated her com-link to Gangon...*
>
> " Gangon...pull me to safety and we can both rest together. Then we can
get
> these...Maximal bastards where it really hurts!"
>
> * She then rested her head on the ground, hoping that Gangon would hear
> her.*
